original: @84a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @84a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya dzambha la sto tra /
analyzed: a'arya dzambha la sto tra /
translated: Ārya-Jambhala-Stotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa /
translated: Praise to Noble Jambhala

original: bcom ldan 'das dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dzambha la la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed One, Jambhala.🔽The four-faced Agni of the hundred sacrifices,

original: mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang // seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis //
analyzed: mchod sbyin brgya pa me lha gdong bzhi dang // seng ge 'phrog byed nyin mor byed rnams kyis //
translated: the lion, Rāhu, and the sun,

original: zhabs gnyis la btud bcom ldan sdug bsngal pa //
analyzed: zhabs gnyis la btud bcom ldan sdug bsngal pa //
translated: bowed to your two feet, O Blessed One,

original: bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs ;
analyzed: bdag la pad ltar yangs pa'i spyan ras gzigs ;
translated: who looks with eyes as wide as lotuses upon those who suffer.

original: / bcom ldan chab khyor gang gis mnyes 'gyur na //
analyzed: / bcom ldan chab khyor gang gis mnyes 'gyur na //
translated: If the Blessed One is pleased with a mere cup of water,

original: thugs rje mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs //
analyzed: thugs rje mnga' ba gzhan gang lags pa gsungs //
translated: tell me, what other compassionate one is there?

original: de phyir mchod pa bshams la mi rtsi zhing //
analyzed: de phyir mchod pa bshams la mi rtsi zhing //
translated: Therefore, do not value the offerings arranged here,

original: khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher rnyed par dka' //
analyzed: khyod dang 'dra ba phal cher rnyed par dka' //
translated: for it is difficult to find one like you.

original: brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas //
analyzed: brtse bas 'bad pa'i sgo nas btsal btsal nas //
translated: Having sought and sought through loving effort,

original: phongs par gyur pa bdag la bde mdzad na //
analyzed: phongs par gyur pa bdag la bde mdzad na //
translated: you have brought happiness to me, the destitute.

original: kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong spags pa //
analyzed: kho bo mchi ma dag gis gdong spags pa //
translated: My face is covered with tears,

original: spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags //
analyzed: spyan sngar mchis kyang ci ste gzigs ma lags //
translated: but why do you not look upon me as I stand before you?

original: ae ma'o rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi //
analyzed: ae ma'o rab tu rgyas pa thugs rje yi //
translated: Ah! The great compassion is expanded.🔽

original: gzhu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang //🔽skye tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi //
analyzed: gzhu mo mnga' ba khyod lta bzhugs gyur kyang // skye tshogs bzlog dka' sdug bsngal chom rkun gyi //
translated: Alas! You are the one who possesses the bow of compassion,🔽but how is it that the multitude of beings,🔽who are difficult to turn away from suffering, are destroyed

original: ste yis rnam par 'joms par ji ltar lags //🔽sems can sman slad nor phu rin po che //
analyzed: ste yis rnam par 'joms par ji ltar lags // sems can sman slad nor phu rin po che //
translated: by the thief of suffering?🔽If you rain down a rain of various jewels

original: rnam pa sna tshogs dgung char 'bebs drag na //🔽kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa //
analyzed: rnam pa sna tshogs dgung char 'bebs drag na // kho bo khyod nyid gcig pu'i mthar thug pa //
translated: for the sake of the medicine of sentient beings,

original: ci ste thigs pa yang ni 'bebs ma lags //
analyzed: ci ste thigs pa yang ni 'bebs ma lags //
translated: why do you not rain down even a drop🔽at the end of my own existence?

original: khyod bzhugs bzhin du me yis 'bar ba ltar //
analyzed: khyod bzhugs bzhin du me yis 'bar ba ltar //
translated: Just as if I were burning in a fire,

original: kho bo phongs pas shin tu cher bsreg na //
analyzed: kho bo phongs pas shin tu cher bsreg na //
translated: I am greatly burned by poverty.

original: khyod kyis lta zhig thugs rje 'jo ba'i ba //
analyzed: khyod kyis lta zhig thugs rje 'jo ba'i ba //
translated: Where has the compassion of the one who sees gone,

original: sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal //
analyzed: sa gsum khur du khur ba gang du thal //
translated: the one who carries the burden of the three worlds?🔽Even those who are not endowed with

original: bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi //🔽nor bu sems dpa' dang ldan ma lags pa //
analyzed: bum pa dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi // nor bu sems dpa' dang ldan ma lags pa //
translated: the wish-fulfilling tree, the wish-fulfilling jewel,

original: de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na //
analyzed: de dag gis kyang sems can phan bgyid na //
translated: or the mind of the bodhisattva benefit sentient beings.

original: thugs rje'i bdag @84b can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal //
analyzed: thugs rje'i bdag @84b can bcom ldan smos ci 'tshal //
translated: What need is there to mention the Blessed One, who possesses compassion?

original: gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yi dbang po zhes //
analyzed: gang zhig rmugs 'dzin chu yi dbang po zhes //
translated: Whoever, even for a moment, recites your name,

original: skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa //🔽de la padma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du //
analyzed: skad cig kyang ni khyod kyi mtshan smos pa // de la padma'i 'byung gnas legs bzhin du //
translated: O Ocean, Lord of the Waters,🔽The glory of the blossoming lotus enters him,

original: pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyid pa lags //
analyzed: pad rgyas dpal ni 'jug par bgyid pa lags //
translated: As if he were a lotus lake.

original: de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan sngar //
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan srid 'joms khyod spyan sngar //
translated: Thus, in the presence of the Blessed One, the Conqueror of Existence,

original: cho nges btab pa'i bsod nams 'byam klas pa //
analyzed: cho nges btab pa'i bsod nams 'byam klas pa //
translated: May the boundless merit of these lamentations🔽Cause beings to produce the desired fruit,

original: gang yin de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du //🔽mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog / bcom ldan 'das rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon chen po btsun ba zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: gang yin de yis skye bo khyod bzhin du // mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byin par shog / bcom ldan 'das rmugs 'dzin la bstod pa slob dpon chen po btsun ba zla bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: Just as you have done.🔽The praise of the Blessed Ocean by the great master Venerable Candragomin is complete.

original: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o//
analyzed: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po mu ti ta shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo ts'a ba tshab nyi ma grags kyis legs par bsgyur ba'o//
translated: It was translated well by the Indian preceptor Mutīśvarajñāna and the Tibetan translator Tsap Nyima Drak.
